attributes.action: make Steve McClaren give the huge compensation package he is going to receive for losing his job back to the FA to re-invest in the grass roots game in England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Steve McClaren is being rewarded handsomely for failing to qualify for the Euro 2008 Championships.

We believe that McClaren does not deserve this pay-out and this should be given to charity or re-invested in the grass roots game in England.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
